author: Special Correspondent
M Soundariya Preetha
text:
Religion

Sadhana Sadhan: Thiruppugazh, Madhav Nagar, Vadavalli, 11 a.m.; Samkirtan, 5.30 p.m.

Arulmigu Sri Kannanur Mariamman Temple, Arulmigu Sri Kundathu Kaaliamman Temple: Special pujas, Pappanaikenpalayam, 6 p.m.

General

The Institution of Engineers (India), Coimbatore centre: World Water Day 2016 meeting, PSG College of Technology, 6.15 p.m.

GRG School of Management Studies: E-Talk by S. Muthuraman, Managing Director of Lakshmi Ceramics, 3 p.m.

JCT College of Engineering and Technology: Workshop, seminar hall, 10 a.m.

Coimbatore North Small Industries’ Association: Talk on “Win Over Mental Stress”, CONSIA Hall, 6.30 p.m.

LIC Pensioners’ Association: Meeting, Saroj Nilayam, 10.30 a.m.

H&C Stores: Children’s book fair, 100 feet road, 11 a.m.

Pollachi

Dr. Mahalingam College of Engineering and Technology: Arutchelvar Vidya Sakthi Scholarship Award function, 3 p.m.
title: Engagements. Coimbatore
